item.title: Report X-2024081403
item.description:
Report X-2024081403

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-18
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: During sort operations at the MSPA location a fiberboard box was found with signs of a release. While investigating the shipment the spill agent found a glass bottle packaged with styrofaom molds top and bottom. The glas bottle was broken and all contents spilled inside of the fiberboard box. A packing slip inside identified the contents as dimethyl sulfoxide as a UN2810. There were no DG markings or paperwork on the outside of the fiberboard box. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and is being held at the location.
